channel.title: Comments on: Shop Til You Drop – Wednesday, July 26, 2017

item.title: By: Eleanor McDougall
item.dc:creator: Eleanor McDougall
item.description: Sounds like you had a great & productive week with your mom, Cyndie! Still laughing about the "toileting troubles"! Hope to see you next visit!
item.content:encoded: Sounds like you had a great & productive week with your mom, Cyndie! Still laughing about the “toileting troubles”! Hope to see you next visit!

item.title: By: Debbie Pollak (daughter of Sarah Pollak)
item.dc:creator: Debbie Pollak (daughter of Sarah Pollak)
item.description: Oh my, you go girl!!!!!! I have been house bound for a week. Sometimes I cannot walk. I have missed going to water aerobics. I have to be lifted in and out of the pool because my arms and shoulders are in so much pain. I don't know when I can go back. I may need physical therapy. We would be a great team in the pool. I cannot wait until you can be back with us. I have no idea when I can go back myself. I love you. Miss you. As soon as my new doctor fixes me, I will drive out to see you. Debbie
item.content:encoded:
Oh my, you go girl!!!!!! I have been house bound for a week. Sometimes I cannot walk. I have missed going to water aerobics. I have to be lifted in and out of the pool because my arms and shoulders are in so much pain. I don’t know when I can go back. I may need physical therapy. We would be a great team in the pool. I cannot wait until you can be back with us. I have no idea when I can go back myself. I love you. Miss you. As soon as my new doctor fixes me, I will drive out to see you.
Debbie

item.title: By: Greg Crider
item.dc:creator: Greg Crider
item.description: Cyndie, good to hear that your Mom got to go shopping. Too funny about your toilet mishaps. Keeps Sue laughing though.
item.content:encoded: Cyndie, good to hear that your Mom got to go shopping. Too funny about your toilet mishaps. Keeps Sue laughing though.
